verses.verse: Then he brought me back<WH7725> the way<WH1870> of the gate<WH8179> of the outward<WH2435> sanctuary<WH4720> which looks<WH6437> toward the east<WH6921>; and it was shut<WH5462>.

And you have not kept<WH8104> the charge<WH4931> of my holy things<WH6944>: but you have set<WH7760> keepers<WH8104> of my charge<WH4931> in my sanctuary for yourselves<WH4720>.

Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; No stranger<WH1121>, uncircumcised<WH6189> in heart<WH3820>, nor uncircumcised<WH6189> in flesh<WH1320>, shall enter<WH935> into my sanctuary<WH4720>, of any stranger that is among<WH8432> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

And they shall not come near<WH5066> unto me<WH3547>, to do the office of a priest unto me<WH5066>, nor to come near to any of my holy things<WH6944>, in the most holy<WH6944> place<WH5375>: but they shall bear their shame<WH3639>, and their abominations<WH8441> which they have committed<WH6213>.

Neither shall they shave<WH1548> their heads<WH7218>, nor allow their locks<WH6545> to grow long<WH7971>; they shall only<WH3697> shear<WH3697> their heads<WH7218>.

Neither shall they take<WH3947> for their wives<WH802> a widow<WH490>, nor her that is put away<WH1644>: but they shall take<WH3947> maidens<WH1330> of the seed<WH2233> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, or a widow<WH490> that had a priest before<WH3548>.

And they shall come<WH935> at no dead<WH4191> person<WH120> to defile<WH2930> themselves<WH1>: but for father, or for mother<WH517>, or for son<WH1121>, or for daughter<WH1323>, for brother<WH251>, or for sister<WH269> that has had no husband<WH376>, they may defile themselves<WH2930>.
And after<WH310> he is cleansed<WH2893>, they shall reckon<WH5608> unto him seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>.

And in the day<WH3117> that he goes<WH935> into the sanctuary<WH6944>, unto the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691>, to minister<WH8334> in the sanctuary<WH6944>, he shall offer<WH7126> his sin offering<WH2403>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>.
And it shall be unto them for a inheritance<WH5159>: I am their inheritance<WH5159>: and you shall give<WH5414> them no possession<WH272> in Israel<WH3478>: I am their possession<WH272>.
They shall eat<WH398> the food offering<WH4503>, and the sin offering<WH2403>, and the trespass offering<WH817>; and every dedicated thing<WH2764> in Israel shall be theirs<WH3478>.

And the first<WH7225> of all the firstfruits<WH1061> of all things<WH8641>, and every oblation of all<WH8641>, of every sort of your oblations, shall be the priest<WH3548>'s: you shall also give<WH5414> unto the priest<WH3548> the first<WH7225> of your dough<WH6182>, that he may cause the blessing<WH1293> to rest<WH5117> in your house<WH1004>.
